thread.section_title: Regtransfers.co.uk Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Regtransfers.co.uk | www.regtransfers.co.uk | 4 of 59
thread.title: Mr Douglas

author: Mr Douglas
title: Mr Douglas
text: Bought the reg last week and immediately received email advising what I needed to send to Regtransfers. Sent documents on Tuesday last and by Wednesday afternoon received both an email and a text message advising that the transfer was complete and the new reg plates could be put on my vehicle - whoo how quick is that? Really really impressed, you pay for the purchase and everything else is taken care of as if by magic, excellent. I define quality as 'exceeding the customers expectations' and Regtransfers does this effortlessly. Thanks
